data.message: pi ture me naked. reading this..picture me incessantly watching..picture me buying a plane ticket..picture me going crazy..picture me followin u around sum more..picture the police arrestin me..picture me fallin to the floor..picture the officer giving me a blanket..picture my clothes lyin on your front door? picture me getting no visters..where they pictured to lock me up..picture me shootin ma brains out..coz im pictured me fucked up!!! picture the funeral i picture you never hear about..and i picture you calling in a ghost hunting mob to picture my ghost outa your HOUSE!! NOW IVE PICTURED ALL THAT..im whacked!...(only in fun y all only in fun..peace out!)
